1169960.name: Pride Run: Soundtrack
1169960.description:
Pride Run is a celebration of Pride events around the world and all things LGBTQ+. experience tracks inspired by the most iconic cities around the globe and some amazing bonus tracks!

Tracklist


City Tracks:

Berlin
Delhi
Istanbul
Johannesburg
London
Madrid
Moscow
Paris
Pisa
Rome
San Francisco
Stockholm
Stonewall
Sydney
Tokyo
Toronto

Bonus Tracks:

Hey DJ
I Love Younicorns
Over The Rainbow
Play It Out Loud
Play With Me
Pride Run Theme Extended
Pride Run Theme
The Bottom Megamix
The Top MegaMix
1169960.supported_languages: 英语, 意大利语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 日语, 俄语
